"The Crab Nebula is a supernova remnant in the constellation of Taurus. It lies at a distance of about 6,500 light–years from Earth."
"The Flame Nebula is an emission nebula in the constellation Orion. It is about 900 to 1,500 light–years away."
"The NGC 2068 nebula is a reflection nebula in the constellation Orion. The distance from Earth is between 900 and 1,500 light–years."
"The Bubble Nebula is an emission nebula in the constellation Cassiopeia. It lies at a distance of 7100 to 11000 light–years from Earth"
"The Carina Nebula is a large area of bright and dark nebulosity in the constellation Carina. It lies at a distance of 6,500 to 10,000 light–years from Earth."
"NGC 1333 is a reflection nebula located in the constellation Perseus. Estimated distance from Earth is around 1,000 light–years.
"The Trifid Nebula is a combination of an open cluster of stars and a nebula located in the constellation of Sagittarius. It is approximately 5000 light–years away from Earth."
"The Cat's Eye Nebula is a planetary nebula in the constellation of Draco. It lies about 3,000 to 5,300 light–years from Earth."
"The Dumbbell Nebula is a planetary nebula in the constellation Vulpecula. It lies at a distance of about 1,360 light–years from Earth."
"The Helix Nebula is a planetary nebula located in the constellation Aquarius. It has sometimes been referred to as the \"Eye of Sauron\". It lies at a distance of around 700 light–years from Earth.
